text: Anɨb agek, kɨcheki bɨawl ak ne Jisas nop dad Jelusalem amɨl, dam God agnɨgep kal awl adek awl oklaŋ amɨl agak, Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, God ne agek, ensel ne okok nep kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgabal agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Apyap pakɨnɨg ge, ñɨn kɨli ak nep dɨ yenɨgabal ak nɨm, kab tob nep puŋɨlɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Anɨb ak, nad God Ñɨne mɨdɨl nɨm, pɨdeg lum ayaŋ lan agak.
